content: **note ** this was originally a free pattern but unfortunately several people started downloading it to sell for their own profit in an attempt to avoid that in the future i ve set a price but you can use code ***townsquaresweaterhalfoff*** or ***townsquaresweaterfree*** for a half or full discount **the town square sweater is a top-down drop-shoulder textured sweater featuring ribbing i-cords and a lovely grid texture this pattern has been tech edited and test knit in all sizes matching made-to-measure pet sweater pattern included ** each of my designs will be a hand-knit postcard inspired by one of my favorite places my town square has long been one of my favorite spots to knit and i can t imagine of a better location for my first sweater **sizing** * recommended ease 11-15 // 28-38cm * sizes 1 2 3 4 5 6 * to fit bust sizes 30-34 35-39 40-44 45-49 50-54 55-59 // 75-85cm 88-99cm 100-112cm 113-124cm 125-139cm 140-150cm * approximate garment bust size 45 50 55 60 65 70 // 113cm 125cm 138cm 150cm 163cm 178cm **gauge** * 20st/26rows per 10cm/4 in 2x2 rib knit flat be sure to block your gauge swatch as this texture will relax quite a bit during the blocking process **materials** * yarn worsted weight * yarn quantity 1050 1220 1390 1560 1730 1900 yards // 960 1115 1270 1425 1580 1740 meters * blue sample used wool and the gang s shiny happy cotton in color cloudy blue * orange sample used cascade 220 in color ginger * needles 4 5mm/us7 and 3 75mm/us5 this sweater was originally inspired by a retail sweater by the brand the knotty ones over time it s truly evolved and taken on a life of its own **i hope you enjoy this pattern as much as i enjoyed making it ** **see you at the town square - liz** tech editing by @aurora marlowe
